mapper.select: select d.id_ from admin_department_manager dm join admin_department d on d.id_ = dm.department_id and d.enable_ = 1 where dm.user_id = #{userId} order by d.tree_position
select s.id_ from resource_station_group_user u join resource_station_group s on s.id_ = u.station_group_id and s.enable_ = 1 where u.type_ = 1 and u.user_id = #{userId}

select u.* from admin_user u join admin_department d on d.id_ = u.department_id and d.enable_ = 1 where u.enable_ = 1 and u.id_ in
#{item}

select t.create_by as userId, t.status_ as contentStatus, count(1) as contentNumber
group by t.create_by, t.status_;

select * from station_catalog where enable_ = 1 and id_ in
#{item}

select ct.catalog_id as catalogId, t.status_ as contentStatus, count(1) as contentNumber
group by ct.catalog_id, t.status_;
